page.title: 14A Boy's Home Life
page.content: On Saturday I woke up before the rest of my family, which is my mother, father, brother Niclos who is 12 and my brother Matthew who is 14.I go downstairs to meet Burgess(who is our Airedale terrier dog).Everytime he runs up stairs onto my Mum's and Dad's bed and wakes them up they tell me off.I have my breakfast which is shreddies, if it is a nice day like it usually is.We go out to Brighton,mum buy's things for Matthew and Niclos (my brothers) like clothes,I buy toys and some Dungeons and Dragons lead figures,when I get home and have my lunch then I go to Mark or Nathan's house(these are my friends).By the time I get home I have my dinner which is fish and chips,then when I have finished (in other words an hour later because I am a slow eater)I go to bed. Richard Smith age 9
